code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./TestimonialsCarousel.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const testimonialsData=[{name:"Shraddha Sharma",message:"Very simple to use, friendly website"},{name:"Prabhat Yadav",message:"Thanking you very much for your support for getting our policy quickly, I would appreciate your work."},{name:"Neha Jain",message:"You are doing a great job. I recommend them to everyone."}];const TestimonialsCarousel=()=>{const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);const itemsPerPage=3;const totalSlides=Math.ceil(testimonialsData.length/itemsPerPage);const handleNext=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex+1)%totalSlides);};const handlePrev=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex-1+totalSlides)%totalSlides);};const handleDotClick=index=>{setCurrentIndex(index);};const visibleTestimonials=testimonialsData.slice(currentIndex*itemsPerPage,currentIndex*itemsPerPage+itemsPerPage);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["What Our Customers ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," Are Saying"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-arrows",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePrev,children:"\u2190"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleNext,children:"\u2192"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial-cards",children:visibleTestimonials.map((testimonial,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:testimonial.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quote-icon",children:"\u201C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:testimonial.message})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dots-container",children:Array.from({length:totalSlides}).map((_,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`dot ${currentIndex===idx?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>handleDotClick(idx)},idx))})]});};export default TestimonialsCarousel;
